page.title: 12Folk Customs
page.content: May Day in Melincryddan. May Day in Melin involves many events. These include a Fun Run and May Pole dancing.May Day takes place on the first Monday in May. Mr.Henry Wood organizes May Day in Melincryddan.Usually there are parades and bands.The money we raise goes to Luekemia Research or the Hospital.A Tug of War involves many pubs who fight for the trophies and cup.This year the Eaglesbush won. Wednesday 1st May Pub/Club Quiz at Melin Social Club. Saturday 4th May Maypole Dancing outside Tesco/Boots precinct. Sunday 5th May Second annual Fun Run. Monday 6th May Fete in Evans Road Playing Fields.
